content: **this pattern was designed as a mystery sock mock for the january/february 2025 stranded colorwork challenge in the sock knitters anonymous group on ravelry ** the pattern is divided into a series of four clues to be released on january 1 8 15 and 22 of 2025 because it is designed as a mystery no photos of the socks are present in any of the clues and all project pages should use a spoiler shield as the first photo when knitting along with the kal the inspiration for the pattern is the golden age of the roaring 20s this pattern gives me gatsby feels **materials** fingering weight sock yarn designer used hazel knits artisan sock 400 yds/120g * main color mc 30 35 40 grams / 100 120 140 yards solid color recommended the mc is used as the main color in the stranded colorwork sections * contrast color cc 65 70 75 grams / 220 235 250 yards solid tonal or lightly variegated with moderate to strong contrast to mc recommended the cc will be used for the cuff heel and toe as well as the motif color in the stranded colorwork sections *note the provided charts assume a light mc and darker cc * us size 1 2 25mm circular needles or size for desired gauge * see below * us size 1 5 2 5 mm circular needles * optional for stranded colorwork sections * * this pattern is written for magic loop but can be adapted to your preferred needle type tips for other methods are given in the instructions locking/removable stitch markers 4-5 cable needle & tapestry needle **gauge** 8 or 9 spi stitches per inch in 2-color stranded colorwork * at 9 spi the sock will be 6 9 7 8 8 7 in circumference * at 8 spi the sock will be 7 75 8 75 9 75 in circumference this pattern is offered free but if you would like to buy me a cup of coffee 1 i would appreciate it **follow
